The Union for Democracy and Progress group (, , UDP) is a Mauritanian parliamentary group in the National Assembly. It was created after the Union for Democracy and Progress (UDP) secured ten seats in the 2023 Mauritanian parliamentary election, three more than the required to form a parliamentary group.
